participants.name: Michelle Walsh
participants.title: Senior Talent Acquisition Advisor | Recruitment Consultant | Headhunter | Global Technology

messages.message: Hi Brian - Thank you. I see that you just started at your job.  How's that going?  Maybe you can recommend a Full Stack Developer for my small online services client?  They are looking for someone with Java experience, working in an agile environment.  It is the first IT role that I have ever recruited for...so please overlook any mistakes I make in describing the role.  The client has a dominant lead in their niche service offering.  The team is young and super positive.  Finding like-minded team members is important for them.  If you have any ideas would love to hear back from you.  Have a great weekend!  Michelle
I am actually on the market again. This job was 3 years ago and it was totally awesome the entire time.

Hi Brian - Great.  I just sent you job details to your gmail address.  If it sounds like it would be of interest to you please send your CV in reply to the e-mail and we will schedule a call this week.  thank you - Michelle
I haven't seen a job description.  Sorry I meant to send this last night with the last message.  Here is an updated copy of my resume:

Hi Brian - I sent it to 
megamindbrian@gmail.com
 which is the address on your profile.  But let's see if I can copy and paste it here!  I think you have a great profile for our client.  Would you be available to speak tomorrow, Monday?  I would like to call you at 11 a.m. or 12 noon Phoenix time if that works for you.  thanks! Michelle
I am not a Java developer though so it doesn't look like this position will fit.  Thank you anyways.
aha.  thank you for your feedback.  I'll let you know if we have something else suitable. have a great week.
